domain.name: Person

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@MattHancock Does your government regret pushing away EU "immigrant" nurses and doctors?  It should. 
The elderly are most vulnerable to catching coronavirus yet you have to count on retired nurses and doctors to come back. They are to be admired. Not you or your government.
